parameters.name: AlongEdgeDirection
parameters.description: True to start the fillet at the start point of the edge, false to start the fillet at the end point of the edge

parameters.name: StartCondition
parameters.description: Start condition as defined in swSimpleFilletPartialEdgeCondition_e (see Remarks )

parameters.name: StartValue
parameters.description: Distance or percent offset from the start point (see Remarks )

parameters.name: StartReference
parameters.description: Offset reference (2D/3D sketch point , reference point , planar face ); valid only if StartCondition is swPartialEdgeReferenceOffset

parameters.name: EndCondition
parameters.description: End condition as defined in swSimpleFilletPartialEdgeCondition_e (see Remarks )

parameters.name: EndValue
parameters.description: Distance or percent offset from the end point (see Remarks )

parameters.name: EndReference
parameters.description: Offset reference (2D/3D sketch point , reference point , planar face ); valid only if EndCondition is swPartialEdgeReferenceOffset

title: IPartialEdgeFilletData.SetPartialFilletParameters
description: Sets the properties of this partial edge fillet.
signature:
System.Int32 SetPartialFilletParameters( 
   System.Boolean
AlongEdgeDirection
,
   System.Int32
StartCondition
,
   System.Double
StartValue
,
   System.Object
StartReference
,
   System.Int32
EndCondition
,
   System.Double
EndValue
,
   System.Object
EndReference
)

parameters.name: AlongEdgeDirection
parameters.description: True to start the fillet at the start point of the edge, false to start the fillet at the end point of the edge

parameters.name: StartCondition
parameters.description: Start condition as defined in swSimpleFilletPartialEdgeCondition_e (see Remarks )

parameters.name: StartValue
parameters.description: Distance or percent offset from the start point (see Remarks )

parameters.name: StartReference
parameters.description: Offset reference (2D/3D sketch point , reference point , planar face ); valid only if StartCondition is swPartialEdgeReferenceOffset

parameters.name: EndCondition
parameters.description: End condition as defined in swSimpleFilletPartialEdgeCondition_e (see Remarks )

parameters.name: EndValue
parameters.description: Distance or percent offset from the end point (see Remarks )

parameters.name: EndReference
parameters.description: Offset reference (2D/3D sketch point , reference point , planar face ); valid only if EndCondition is swPartialEdgeReferenceOffset

returns: Result code as defined in swFeatureError_e
remarks:
StartValue (or EndValue) is a:
Distance if StartCondition (or EndCondition) is swSimpleFilletPartialEdgeCondition_e.swPartialEdgeDistanceOffset.
Percent value if StartCondition (or EndCondition) is swSimpleFilletPartialEdgeCondition_e.swPartialEdgePercentOffset.
